events.message: I am filing a claim for a car accident that occurred yesterday evening when another vehicle collided with mine at an intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial details submitted by the policyholder.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle and guide the claimant through the auto accident claim process.
We have acknowledged receipt of your auto accident claim and will be investigating the circumstances promptly.
Please provide the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and any medical reports related to injuries sustained in the accident.
The claimant has submitted all requested documents including the police report and detailed injury medical reports.
The claims investigation team has started reviewing submitted documents and contacting witnesses to verify accident details.
Investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault and all damages are covered under the policy terms.
A settlement proposal covering vehicle repairs and medical expenses has been sent to the claimant for approval.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the communication and timely handling of the auto accident claim.
The claim has been formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the policyholder.
Payment for damages and medical bills has been issued to the claimant's account as per the approved settlement.
The auto accident claim is now closed as all procedures are complete and the claimant's case has been resolved.
